data.caption: Clarification sought from Reliable Data Services Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Reliable Data Services Ltd on July 19, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Reliable Data Services Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 10, 2024, the equity shares of Reliable Data Services Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544207) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of ''B'' Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20240708-28 dated July 08, 2024.
